text: hi my name is faith I'm a teacher here
at sleep learning for those of you who
are already subscribed we want to thank
you so much for your support and let you
know that we're working on creating
exciting new content for you new comers
we want to welcome you to the channel we
hope you enjoy our content sleep
learnings aim is to help you learn and
develop your speaking ability in various
languages the intended use is for
primarily right before bed because this
has been proven to be a great time to
learn and remember new things but you
can use our content whatever time of day
that you like we're uploading new
content every month so don't forget to
subscribe to our Channel and recommend
us to your friends and family
